```{r warning = F, error = F, message = F, echo = F}
fileName <- 
  'functionList.csv'
baseURL <- 
  'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/am-consulting/am-consulting.github.io/master/'
functionList <- 
  read.csv(
    file = paste0(baseURL,'csv/',fileName),
    header = F,
    as.is = T)
for(iii in 1:nrow(functionList)){
  script <- 
    RCurl::getURL(paste0(baseURL,functionList[iii,1]),ssl.verifypeer = F)
  eval(parse(text = script))
}
```

```{r warning=F,error=F,message=F,echo=F,results='hide'}

buf <- votes

rrr <- 1
tmp0 <- buf[rrr,]
tmp1 <- t(tmp0)
tmp2 <- data.frame(row.names(tmp1),tmp1,stringsAsFactors = F,check.names = F,row.names = NULL)
colnames(tmp2) <- tmp2[1,]
tmp3 <- tmp2[-1,]
tmp3[,2] <- as.numeric(tmp3[,2])
objRaw <- grep('全党派計',tmp3[,1])
tmp3[,3] <- round(tmp3[,2]/tmp3[objRaw,2]*100,2)
areaTxt <- colnames(tmp3)[2]
colnames(tmp3) <- c('地区','票数','率')
tmp3[,1] <- gsub(':票数','',tmp3[,1])
tmp3[order(tmp3$`率`,decreasing = T),]
```
